name: Retaliate
overview: You are a valiant space hero that unfortunately is out of ammunition. Now you must activate your shield pressing the joystick down to kill aliens and absorb their bullets. Then hit fire to Retaliate! But be careful, your shield energy only lasts for a few seconds, then you ned to release the joystick in order to recharge its power. Released the Community Edition to celebrate 4 years of the Retaliate 64 project. The term "Commmunity Edition" is better than "Preview" as this is the complete engine of the game.
